articles.title: Patrick Mahomes and fiancée Brittany Matthews beam in family snap with baby daughter Sterling Skye - Daily Mail
articles.description: Patrick Mahomes II and fiancee Brittany Matthews were all smiles as they kicked off their wedding weekend in Hawaii. They beamed in a snap as they posed with their one-year-old daughter Sterling.
articles.content:
Patrick Mahomes II and his fiancée Brittany Matthews were all smiles as they kicked off their wedding weekend in Hawaii.
